Group.Title: DataGrid
Group.Description: Full-featured grid control with advanced features like grouping, sorting, filtering and export to excel.

Sample.Title: Getting Started
Sample.Name: GridGettingStarted
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the DataGrid with ObservableCollection as the data source.

Sample.Title: Sorting
Sample.Name: Sorting
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the sorting capabilities of data in DataGrid that allows you to sort against one or more columns and also provides tri-state sorting functionality.

Sample.Title: Custom Sorting
Sample.Name: CustomSorting
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the custom sorting capabilities in DataGrid that enables you to implement custom sorting logic.

Sample.Title: Filtering
Sample.Name: Filtering
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the filtering capabilities of data in DataGrid.

Sample.Title: Frozen Row
Sample.Name: FrozenRow
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the freeze panes capability of DataGrid which provides support to freeze rows at the top.

Sample.Title: Cell Template
Sample.Name: CellTemplate
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the template column feature of DataGrid which provides support for loading templates to the column.

Sample.Title: Grouping
Sample.Name: Grouping
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the grouping capability of data in DataGrid.

Sample.Title: Custom Grouping
Sample.Name: CustomGrouping
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the custom grouping capabilities in DataGrid which enables you to implement custom grouping logic.

Sample.Title: Selection
Sample.Name: Selection
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the selection capability of DataGrid which provides selection mode options like single, multiple, single-deselect and none.

Sample.Title: Editing
Sample.Name: Editing
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the editing capabilities of DataGrid which provides support to edit GridTextColumn, GridNumericColumn, GridPickerColumn and GridDateTimeColumn.

Sample.Title: Resizing
Sample.Name: Resizing
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the resizing capabilities of DataGrid which provides resizing mode options like on-moved and on-touch-up.

Sample.Title: Grid Columns
Sample.Name: GridColumns
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the columns capability of DataGrid which provides support for text, image and switch columns.

Sample.Title: Drag And Drop
Sample.Name: DragAndDrop
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the column and row drag and drop capabilities of DataGrid which provide user flexibility when interacting with the grid rows and grid columns.

Sample.Title: Unbound Column
Sample.Name: UnBoundColumn
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the unbound column capability of DataGrid. Unbound columns are extra columns that do not belong to the data source.

Sample.Title: Conditional Styling
Sample.Name: ConditionalFormatting
Sample.Description: The data grid control for Xamarin is a high-performance grid component that is used to display the data in a tabular format.

Sample.Title: Styles
Sample.Name: DataGridStyles
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the styling capabilities of DataGrid. Styling allows you to change the visual appearance of the DataGrid and its inner elements.

Sample.Title: Auto Row Height
Sample.Name: AutoRowHeight
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the auto row height feature of DataGrid which renders grid rows based on its content to improve the readability and occurs on-demand basis.

Sample.Title: Diagonal Scrolling
Sample.Name: DiagonalScrolling
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the diagonal scrolling feature of DataGrid which enables to scroll the grid diagonally.

Sample.Title: Load More
Sample.Name: LoadMore
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the load more capability of DataGrid that allows you to load a subset of data to the bound data source using built-in UI.

Sample.Title: Pull To Refresh
Sample.Name: PullToRefresh
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the pull-to-refresh capability of DataGrid which allows you to refresh the data source upon pull-to-refresh action.

Sample.Title: Paging
Sample.Name: Paging
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the paging capabilities of DataGrid using SfDataPager which allows you to load the data from the data source in an efficient way.

Sample.Title: Swiping
Sample.Name: Swiping
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the swiping capabilities of DataGrid which allow you to load swipe views and associate them with custom actions.

Sample.Title: Rendering Dynamic Data
Sample.Name: RenderingDynamicData
Sample.Description: This sample illustrates the frequent updates that occur in random cells across the Grid while keeping processor usage to a minimum in the DataGrid.

Sample.Title: Exporting
Sample.Name: Exporting
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the excel and pdf exporting capabilities of DataGrid. DataGrid also provides you various customization options for exporting.
